Comments_List: I greatly imrpoved my ability to converse in German and my cultural knowledge of Germany.

Everything was great, though I would like to point out some issues with the essays we had to write. I think that the word limit for these essays made it impossible to fulfill all of their requirements (especially in the cultural exploration part). I also think that though topic of cultural analysis was very interesting and appropriate, the essay had unrealistic expectations from students (e.g "The essay should be an in-depth cultural analysis and comparison").
Very much so yes. The structure of the class is such that students have enough time to complete their work while also exploring Germany.

Yes, because the professors and learning assistants truly want to help you succeed in improving your language skills. They will work with you outside of class, and they do not judge you on your lack of experience.
